mapper.select: select *from comQualification where scope like '%${EleAppliance}%' ORDER BY Rating DESC

DECLARE @geog2 GEOGRAPHY Select @geog2=geography::STGeomFromText('POINT (${longitude} ${latitude})', 4326) SELECT *, geography::Point([Lat], [Lon], 4326).STDistance(@geog2) / 1000 AS [distance] FROM comQualification where scope like '%${EleAppliance}%' order by distance asc

DECLARE @geog2 GEOGRAPHY Select @geog2=geography::STGeomFromText('POINT (${longitude} ${latitude})', 4326) SELECT bName,Rating, geography::Point([Lat], [Lon], 4326).STDistance(@geog2) /1000 AS [distance], (geography::Point([Lat], [Lon], 4326).STDistance(@geog2) / 1000)/(Rating+13) AS [Synthesize] FROM comQualification where scope like '%${EleAppliance}%' and Rating>0 order by Synthesize ASC
